!1 Test MP_Meter - Meter Types

Verify meter type master data.

!include -c TestLoginGardenWorld

----
!2 Count Meters

!|Set Variable|
|@MeterCount@ |@SQL=SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mp_meter WHERE ad_client_id=11|

!|Assert Variable|
|@MeterCount@ |3|

----
!2 Verify Kilometers Meter

!|Assert Record|
|*Table*      |MP_Meter    |
|mp_meter_id  |1100001     |
|*Read*       |            |
|name         |Kilometers  |
|maxday       |30          |
|isactive     |Y           |

----
!2 Verify Operating Hours Meter

!|Assert Record|
|*Table*      |MP_Meter       |
|mp_meter_id  |1100002        |
|*Read*       |               |
|name         |Operating Hours|
|maxday       |7              |

----
!2 Verify Calendar Days Meter

!|Assert Record|
|*Table*      |MP_Meter      |
|mp_meter_id  |1100003       |
|*Read*       |              |
|name         |Calendar Days |

----
!2 Create New Meter

!|Create Record|
|*Table*      |MP_Meter           |
|ad_org_id    |11                 |
|name         |FitNesse Test Meter|
|maxday       |14                 |
|*Save*       |                   |

!|Assert Record|
|*Table*      |MP_Meter           |
|mp_meter_id  |@MP_Meter.MP_Meter_ID@|
|*Read*       |                   |
|name         |FitNesse Test Meter|

----
!2 Cleanup

!|Delete Record|
|*Table*      |MP_Meter                              |
|*Where*      |name='FitNesse Test Meter'            |
|*Delete*     |                                      |
